messages.subject: Skin color
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/5/2003 11:32:25 PM Central Daylight Time, ... I read somewhere a joke about why black people get call colored, it went something  like:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/5/2003 11:32:25 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> She looked
> at them like they must have been toddlers not to know their colors
> and said with the most confused tone, "What do you mean white? We're
> ORANGE."

I read somewhere a joke about why black people get call colored, it went
something like:
White people are born red, get blue when they're cold, red when they're mad,
grey when they die etc...
The guy said "who're YOU calling colored?" good point.

Ren


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
